# scaleway_instance_export_snapshot (Action)

This action is helpful to export snapshot coming from instance to an object storage



<!-- action schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `bucket` (String) Name of the bucket to export the snapshot to
- `key` (String) Object key to save the snapshot to
- `snapshot_id` (String) ID of the snapshot to export

### Optional

- `wait` (Boolean) Wait for exporting operation to be completed
- `zone` (String) Zone of the snapshot to export
